MAIN_MESSAGE: It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:25PM in the LL41 postcode of Blaenau Ffestiniog, Porthmadog and surrounding areas  following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  difficulty locating the fault Our emergency response team are on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.32PM on 9th February 2021
